citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:55 am on
24-Jan-18.
Reached licensee by phone and he said he was in San Antonio and would not be able to return for an inspection
today
